text: Oršoja Vajda (; born 4 February 1997) is a Serbian footballer who plays as a defender and has appeared for the Serbia women's national team. ==Career== Vajda has been capped for the Serbia national team, appearing for the team during the 2019 FIFA Women's World Cup qualifying cycle. ==References== ==External links== * , part 1 * , part 2 * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian women's footballers Category:Serbia women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders Category:ŽFK Spartak Subotica players
title: Oršoja Vajda
